q: Susan Boyle shot to fame after auditioning for Simon Cowell 's Britain's Got Talent TV show, and she told the music mogul she dreamed of becoming as successful as her idol Elaine Paige . Elaine Paige subsequently labelled Susan Boyle a virus that swept the world , but made up for the slur by performing her track from the Chess musical I Know Him So Well with the unlikely superstar on a U.K. TV special. "There is no other CEO in the world that could have kept such headstrong founders so deeply involved and still run the business so brilliantly," Larry Page said.
